```{r}
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
data = fread("data/results/data_ssf_step_covs.csv")
rrv = fread("data/results/data_daily_rrv.csv")

data[, date := as.character(date)]
rrv[, date := as.character(date)]
```

```{r}
data = merge(
  data,
  rrv,
  by.x = c("id", "date"),
  by.y = c("TAG", "date")
)
```

```{r}
ggplot()+
  geom_histogram(
    data = data,
    aes(
      ndvi_mean_end,
      y = ..density..,
      fill = case_
    ),
    alpha = 0.5,
    position = "identity"
  )+
  theme_test(
    base_family = "Arial"
  )+
  facet_grid(
    ~sp
  )
```
